metadata.title: SheetMark - Convert Spreadsheets to Markdown, JSON, PNG & More
metadata.description: Easily convert your spreadsheet data from CSV, TSV, or by pasting directly into a clean Markdown, JSON, PNG, or HTML table. Fast, free, and easy to use.
metadata.keywords: spreadsheet to markdown, csv to markdown, excel to markdown, table converter, markdown table generator, csv to json, csv to png, sheetmark, hoja de calculo a markdown, csv a markdown

page.title: Convert Spreadsheets to Multiple Formats
page.description: Paste your data or upload a file and get a Markdown, CSV, SQL, HTML, JSON, or PNG table instantly.

converter.inputCardDescription: Paste your spreadsheet data here or upload a file.
converter.inputPlaceholder: Paste your spreadsheet data here (comma or tab separated)...
converter.encodingDescription: Affects uploaded files. If you see '', try another option.
converter.escapeCharsTooltip: Escapes special characters like '|' to prevent table breaking.
converter.addBomTooltip: Add UTF-8 byte order mark to help Excel and other software recognize encoding.

sql.primaryKeyTooltip: Specify Primary Key Field Name For CREATE TABLE statement

html.divTableTooltip: Use divs with classes instead of table tags.
html.columnHeaderTooltip: Treat the first row as table headers (<th>).
html.tableCaptionTooltip: Add a <caption> element to the table.
html.tableClassTooltip: CSS class(es) to add to the table tag.
html.tableIdTooltip: ID to add to the table tag.

json.minifyJsonTooltip: Remove extra whitespace and newlines for a compact output.
json.firstHeaderTooltip: Use the first row of data as keys for the JSON objects.
json.outputDescriptionJson: Here is your data in JSON format.
json.outputPlaceholderJson: Your JSON data will appear here...

png.backgroundColorTooltip: Choose a custom background color for the image.
png.outputDescriptionPng: Here is your table as a PNG image.
png.outputPlaceholderPng: Your PNG image preview will appear here...
png.copyNotSupportedDescription: Copying images to the clipboard is not supported. Please use the download button.
png.conversionError: Could not generate the image. Please try again.

converter.outputPlaceholderMarkdown: Your Markdown table will appear here...
converter.outputPlaceholderCsv: Your CSV data will appear here...
converter.outputPlaceholderSql: Your SQL script will appear here...
converter.outputPlaceholderHtml: Your HTML table code will appear here...
converter.outputDescriptionMarkdown: Here is your table in Markdown format.
converter.outputDescriptionCsv: Here is your data in CSV format.
converter.outputDescriptionSql: Here is your data as an SQL script.
converter.outputDescriptionHtml: Here is your table in HTML format.

toast.fileReadErrorDescription: Could not read the selected file.
toast.encodingErrorDescription: Could not decode the file with {encoding}.
toast.conversionErrorDescription: Could not process the data. Please check the format.
